edu.um.cps2002.tile_game

Class SafeMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Map
      • edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.SafeMap

  • public class SafeMap
extends Map
    The SafeMap class is a Map object, with the implementation of the method generate() which randomly creates a game map with grass and at most 10% water tiles, and one treasure tile.
    Author:
    Luke Collins & Stefania Damato

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.um.cps2002.tile_game.Map

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public void generate()
        This method, generates a 'safe' map. A safe map is a map with at most 10% of the tiles having type 'water'.
        Specified by:
        generate in class Map
